blacklistClearConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to clear __**{{TOTAL}}**__ blacklisted user(s)?

birthdaySetupTimeZone.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: **Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
First, please enter your time zone. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-need-my-timezone)
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker](${Config.links.map})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone. You can then enter it below.
**Example Usage:** `America/New_York`
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!

birthdaySetupTimeZoneChange.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: __**Note**__: Your birthday is already set, continue to change it.
**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
First, please enter your time zone. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-need-my-timezone)
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker](${Config.links.map})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone. You can then enter it below.
**Example Usage:** `America/New_York`
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!

birthdaySetupBirthday.title: Birthday Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: **Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
Please enter your birth month and day. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-only-need-my-birth-month-and-date)
**Example Usage:** `08/28` (MM/DD)
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!

birthdaySetupBirthdayChange.title: Birthday Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: __**Note**__: Your birthday is already set, continue to change it.
**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
Please enter your birth month and day. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-only-need-my-birth-month-and-date)
**Example Usage:** `08/28` (MM/DD)
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!

birthdayExpired.title: Birthday Set - Expired
birthdayExpired.description: Type `bday set` to rerun the birthday setup.

blacklistClearExired.title: Blacklist Clear - Expired
blacklistClearExired.description: Type `bday blacklist clear` to clear the birthday blacklist.

description: Please specify an option!

memberNeedsMessageHistory.description: {{MEMBER}} needs the `READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY` permission in this channel!

emptyBlacklist.description: Your server has not blacklisted any users!

birthday.title: {{REF:terms.birthdayList}} | {{REF:list.pageTitle}}
description: *Birthdays are celebrated on the day (and __time zone__) of the birthday user. To set your birthday use `bday set`!*
{{LIST_DATA}}

birthdayMessageFree.title: {{REF:list.birthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random birthday message is chosen for each birthday message. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-custom-message)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

birthdayMessagePaid.title: {{REF:list.birthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random birthday message is chosen for each birthday message. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-custom-message)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryMessageFree.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random member anniversary message is chosen for each member anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-custom-message)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryMessagePaid.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random member anniversary message is chosen for each member anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-custom-message)*

serverAnniversaryMessagePaid.title: {{REF:list.serverAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random server anniversary message is chosen for each server anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-custom-message)*

customUserMessageFree.title: {{REF:list.userMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific birthday message is the birthday message sent to the designated user on their birthday. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-user-specific-birthday-message)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

customUserMessagePaid.title: {{REF:list.userMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific birthday message is the birthday message sent to the designated user on their birthday. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-user-specific-birthday-message)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

trustedRoleFree.title: {{REF:list.trustedRolesTitle}}
description: *A trusted role decides which roles have their birthday celebrated. Edit how the trusted role(s) work with `bday config` [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-trusted-role)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

trustedRolePaid.title: {{REF:list.trustedRolesTitle}}
description: *A trusted role decides which roles have their birthday celebrated. Edit how the trusted role(s) work with `bday config` [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-trusted-role)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

blacklist.title: {{REF:terms.blacklistList}} | {{REF:list.pageTitle}}
description: *Users on this list will not have their birthdays celebrated no matter what. Edit this list with `bday blacklist <add/remove> <User>`!*
{{LIST_DATA}}

bot.name: Birthday Bot
bot.description: {{REF:links.templateEmbed}} helps your server track and celebrate birthdays by automatically celebrating them with numerous fun and extremely customizable features.

links.supportEmbed: For support join our discord server [here]({{REF:links.support}})!

footers.tryAgain: Please check above and try again!

list.birthdayMessagePaidFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom birthday messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
list.memberAnniversaryMessagePaidFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom member anniversary messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
list.serverAnniversaryMessagePaidFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom server anniversary messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
list.userBirthdayMessageFieldText: User-specific messages are a premium only feature. Unlock them with `bday premium`!
list.trustedRoleFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** trusted roles. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
